Spirit Magic School

The elemental magic of spirit focuses on the manipulation of life forces, souls, and the ethereal.

School Information

Focus Areas

  • Shamanism
  • Spirit Pacts
  • Animal Summoning

Regulation Status: Binding of humanoid spirits considered equivalent to undead creation and is regulated or illegal in many areas.
